welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Konigsbrunn, a charming city known for its rich history and picturesque landscapes. We invite you to explore and immerse yourself in our unique culture. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal for all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal for regional and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
